thread.title: Amazon documents reveal how Prime Video is paying off

title: Amazon documents reveal how Prime Video is paying off
text:
Amazon documents reveal how Prime Video is paying off 3:10pm IST - 02:00 
Amazon's top TV shows drew more than 5 million people worldwide to its shopping club Prime by early 2017, internal documents show, revealing for the first time how its bet on original video is working.   
Amazon's top TV shows drew more than 5 million people worldwide to its shopping club Prime by early 2017, internal documents show, revealing for the first time how its bet on original video is working.  //reut.rs/2IszniS
